title: How to name my beauty and health blog - Quora

response.answer_text: Every blogger wants one for their blog, but the reality is that it's actually quite hard to come up with a unique and memorable name. By looking the blog names that is listed below, the first things that one realizes is that one don't need to include topical keyword into the name in order to create something catchy. We all know there is fine line between creativity, clever wordplay and funnily weird blog names that are memorably catchy One can use many ways or approaches to create a unique and good blog name, but before doing that make sure you know what your target audience like. Skinny Chit ChatForevers Fitting InRunning Mom24/7Fitness & CityHealthful SummerHealthy Fit N FreeDo A RunWaiting 4 SunshineDo A RunGet Fit MomMakeup in corsoMy Beauty JunctionThe Curious Red AliceJasminesqueBeautiful InceptionA Greater GorgeousDairy Of A TrendaholicBomb It BeautyUnwinding MomentsPitchfork ReviewsThe Daily MemeBabes At The MeseumUnhappy HipstersI Love ChartsYour Are SingleReasons My Son Is CryingThe Absurd PuddleDream CatsAnfscuRecovery CornerGetting My "It" BackCelestial PrescriptionLove, Sweat, PeaceFor Their Tender heratsHigh Heels And Hot FlashesYou can get more ideas by clickcing here

According to me, the best way to name a blog or to get a domain for your blog is the combination of your nickname and the niche you want to work on. So while naming your blog keep your nickname in mind (or give yourself a new nickname if you like) and start working :)For Example: I write about Tech & smartphones. My blog’s name is Abdu Geek and i bought www.abdugeek.com for that :)
